TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的類別，用來以邏輯方式表示二進位狀態主機儲存格。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state. A都具有相關聯中每個，與交集。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每個資料格提供類似於使用者介面 (UI)控制項。Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a control. 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . 一般而言，核取方塊儲存格的值是用於存放裝置，例如任何其他資料，或執行大量作業。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果您想要立即當使用者按一下核取方塊儲存格，您可以處理回應事件，但是此事件發生於儲存格的值會更新之前。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果您在按一下時需要新的值，其中一個選項是計算預期的值將會根據目前的值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一個方法是立即認可變更，並處理回應它的事件。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要在按下儲存格時，請認可變更，您必須處理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來標記的員工不在辦公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體為預設狀態。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to the default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此預設建構函式相當於提供的引數`false`至建構函式。Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool threeState) cil managed

param.name: threeState
param.span: 表示顯示具有三種狀態的核取方塊， 表示顯示具有兩種狀態的核取方塊。

span.span: to display check boxes with three states; to display check boxes with two states.

summary.span: 初始化 的新執行個體，並設定其顯示具有兩種或三種狀態的核取方塊。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化資料行，藉由設定下列屬性。This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||新具有其屬性初始化為`threeState`參數值。A new with its property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| ||`threeState` 參數的值。The value of the `threeState` parameter.| ||| |屬性所傳回物件屬性。The property of the object returned by the property.|| |屬性所傳回物件屬性。The property of the object returned by the property.|如果 為 `threeState`，則為 `true`，否則為 `false`。 if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立新儲存格的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: ，做為資料欄中所有其他儲存格的模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

value.span: 預設值是新的 執行個體。

span.span: The default value is a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式類別初始化這個屬性，以新建。The constructors for the class initialize this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者介面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 重新產生資料行後，才明顯這些變更 (例如，則資料行排序或透過呼叫方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來標記的員工不在辦公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 儲存格樣板用來將相同的色彩套用至核取方塊資料行中的所有資料格。The cell template is used to apply the same color to all cells in the check box column. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ DefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 屬性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|預設值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| ||| || 如果初始屬性值是`true`，否則`false`。 if the initial property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| 這些值會覆寫中指定的值屬性的控制項，但是可能會覆寫其他儲存格樣式屬性。These values override the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果屬性所傳回的物件屬性的值為`false`、 變更屬性值設定為`true`會自動設定至。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value of `false`, changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to . 如果的值為、 變更屬性值設定為`false`會自動設定至`false`。If has a value of , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ FalseValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定基礎值，其對應到以未核取的方塊形式出現的 儲存格值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of , which appears as an unchecked box.

value.span: ，表示此資料行中的儲存格將會視為 值的一個值。

span.span: An representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性會決定相關聯的值，這些狀態的基礎資料來源中發生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的資料格物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤 office 光源的狀態。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 屬性會關聯 「 turnedOff" `false`、屬性會關聯 「 turnedOn" `true`，而屬性產生關聯以不確定的 「 未知 」。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要顯示使用視覺化樣式的核取方塊儲存格，將此屬性設定為呼叫方法，然後再。To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to and call the method before . 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的資料格物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來標記的員工不在辦公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

summary.span: 取得或設定基礎值，其對應到以停用的核取方塊形式出現的不定或 儲存格值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.

value.span: ，表示此資料行中的儲存格將會視為不定值的一個值。

span.span: An representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性會決定相關聯的值，這些狀態的基礎資料來源中發生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的資料格物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤 office 光源的狀態。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 屬性會關聯 「 turnedOff" `false`、屬性會關聯 「 turnedOn" `true`，而屬性產生關聯以不確定的 「 未知 」。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ThreeState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出裝載的核取方塊儲存格是否允許三種而非兩種核取狀態。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.

value.span: 如果裝載的 物件能夠擁有第三個不定狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the hosted objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不確定的狀態非常有用，例如，當您不想設定核取方塊的預設值。The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的資料格物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 如果屬性所傳回的物件屬性的值為`false`、 變更屬性值設定為`true`會自動設定至。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value of `false`, changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to . 如果的值為、 變更屬性值設定為`false`會自動設定至`false`。If has a value of , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤 office 光源的狀態。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 屬性會關聯 「 turnedOff" `false`、屬性會關聯 「 turnedOn" `true`，而屬性產生關聯以不確定的 「 未知 」。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]
